name: TheSecretGame2
description:
StoryYou think you are in a forest but are you? Are that really noises from someone crying? A horror game or a love story? Can you answer these questions?
Many questions you need to answer to save not only yourself from this dark place...
You play a kidnapped person who tries to escape rooms and save a young lady before the dark lord appears.

TheSecretGame2 is entirely based off of our communities suggestions and development to ensure that you guys get the best experience possible, from haunted to calm settings and the real question is when will it end?Features
  • A wonderfully detailed story
  • Ambient music
  • Discord Rich Presence
  • Steam Overlay and Achievements
